channel.title: [Help] Battlescape Command
channel.description: How can i make a ::train command? I've tried to do it and it didn't work :/ I'm using 317 battlescape source

item.title: [Help] Battlescape Command
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

“Battlescape” automatically should tell you that it’s not like the other sources.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Battlescape Command
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Despair, post:5, topic:338685”]Under

public void ReadCommandStrings()

Add

if (Command.startsWith("train")) { teleportToX = 3009; teleportToY = 9550;

Battlescape doesn’t use triggerTele, it uses teleToX and teleportToY. Also always capitalize the “c” when using command. The error was pointing to the “c” with the arrow because it wasn’t capitalized.[/quote]
First of all. . .
I coulda helped him better if he told me what BASE, like delta, figment.
Not what soruce.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Battlescape Command
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Under

public void ReadCommandStrings()

Add

if (Command.startsWith("train")) { teleportToX = 3009; teleportToY = 9550;

Battlescape doesn’t use triggerTele, it uses teleToX and teleportToY. Also always capitalize the “c” when using command. The error was pointing to the “c” with the arrow because it wasn’t capitalized.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Battlescape Command
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“Arta1, post:3, topic:338685”]client.java:29862: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable command
location: class client
if (command.startsWith(“train”)) {
^
client.java:29863: cannot find symbol
symbol : method triggerTele(int,int,int)
location: class client
triggerTele(3009, 9550, 0);
^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]
Did you even add them in right spot?
It’s common sense as well.
Just find another tele commond…

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Battlescape Command
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

Here, I think this will work for Battlescape.
if (command.startsWith(“train”)) {
triggerTele(3009, 9550, 0);
}

Read full topic
